olm.general.molL_to_mgL¶

olm.general.molL_to_mgL(molL, ion)[source]¶

Converts concentrations from mol/L to mg/L.

Parameters
molLfloat or array

concentration in mol/L

ionstr

name of ion

Returns
mgLfloat or array

concentration in mg/L
